## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5159c12014f3592f859dffa0d8c21b7f183b426a36d2de61f052cfa79fc5e809)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@fdp-tools/eslint-formatter' @ 0.0.14 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
